text: On 9 December 2021, a traffic collision occurred in Chiapas, southern Mexico.Mexico truck crash: At least 54 people killed as trailer overturns A truck which contained about 180 migrants - most of whom were Guatemalans - was being driven to the United States. It crashed into a bridge, killing at least 54 of its occupants. ==References== Category:Manslaughter Truck crash Category:Organized crime Category:2020s in Mexico Category:Disasters in Mexico Category:December 2021 events Category:2020s crimes in North America Category:2021 disasters in North America
title: Chiapas truck crash
